Title: Series: The Life of the Virgin
Description: The flight into Egypt by boat; the Holy family on a boat: the Virgin, seated, suckling the infant Christ and St Joseph to left; various fish in the sea and cherubs in the sky. Engraving
Bibliographic references: Hollstein / Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts c.1450-1700 (802.I) (Wierix)
Mauquoy-Hendrickx 1979 / Les Estampes des Wierix ... catalogue raisonné (628)
Alvin 1866 / Catalogue raisonné de l'oeuvre des trois frères Jan, Jérome et Antoine Wierix (425)
